SELECT m_motorcycle.moto_no , m_motorcycle.moto_name , m_motorcycle.brand_id , m_motorcycle.cylinder , m_motorcycle.cooling , m_motorcycle.price , m_motorcycle.comments , m_brand.brand_name FROM m_motorcycle LEFT OUTER JOIN m_brand ON m_motorcycle.brand_id = m_brand.brand_id
AND m_motorcycle.brand_id = #{brandId}
AND m_motorcycle.moto_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY moto_no

SELECT m_motorcycle.moto_no , m_motorcycle.moto_name , m_motorcycle.seat_height , m_motorcycle.cylinder , m_motorcycle.cooling , m_motorcycle.price , m_motorcycle.comments , m_motorcycle.brand_id , m_motorcycle.version , m_brand.brand_name FROM m_motorcycle LEFT OUTER JOIN m_brand ON m_motorcycle.brand_id = m_brand.brand_id WHERE m_motorcycle.moto_no = #{motoNo} ORDER BY moto_no
